name: Shutter/Silent
description: Settings for shutter operation and silent shooting

settings.name: Silent Mode
settings.description: Sets whether to shoot without shutter sounds

settings.name: Target Function Settings
settings.description: Sets which functions are available during silent mode

settings.name: AF w/ shutter
settings.description: Sets whether to perform auto focus when the shutter button is half-pressed in silent mode

settings.name: Shutter when Pwr OFF
settings.description: Sets whether the shutter remains open when the camera is turned off in silent mode

settings.name: Auto Pixel Mapping
settings.description: Sets whether to automatically perform pixel mapping in silent mode

settings.name: Shutter Type
settings.description: Sets whether to use a mechanical or electronic shutter

settings.name: Release w/o Lens
settings.description: Sets whether to release the shutter when no lens is attached

settings.name: Release w/o Card
settings.description: Sets whether to release the shutter when no memory card is inserted

settings.name: Anti-flicker Set.
settings.description: Settings to reduce impact of flickering

settings.name: Anti-flicker Shoot.
settings.description: Reduces impact of flickering from artificial light sources

settings.name: Var. Shutter
settings.description: Allows shutter speed fine adjustments to reduce flicker impact

settings.name: Var. Shutter Set.
settings.description: Sets the shutter speed when [Var. Shutter] is set to [On]
